TopicTitle: Many markings on navball, don't know what do..

Articles.Content:
There many colored markings on the navball at the same time..

Is there a page where I can see what they all mean?
Look at wiki page: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Navball You 'll find all info needed.
I wrote up an explanation of the navball in the tutorials section: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/30238-How-to-Read-the-Navball

The Navball, along with the Add Maneuver tools are your friends that will show you exactly what your rocket will be doing in that huge three dimensional space of the Kerbal system, where all flights take place on curved paths. influenced by gravity. The markings show which way your ship is pointed and the path it is heading in relation to the influence of gravity from the nearest source be it the sun, planet, or moon.
